description: This file is an ESLint configuration extension script that uses the FlatCompat utility to extend base configurations for Next.js projects, specifically 'next/core-web-vitals' and 'next/typescript'. It sets up compatibility for ESLint configuration files using modern JavaScript syntax.

methods.name: __filename
methods.description: Defines the current filename path using URL to Path conversion.

methods.name: __dirname
methods.description: Defines the directory name of the current file.

methods.name: compat.extends
methods.description: Method to extend existing ESLint configurations using FlatCompat.
